DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to explore the efficacy and safety of ATryn® (antithrombin alfa) for the treatment of disseminated intravascular coagulation (DIC) associated with severe sepsis, when administered by continuous intravenous (IV) infusion over five days.
DOC.brief_title: Recombinant Human Antithrombin (ATryn®) in the Treatment of Patients With DIC Associated With Severe Sepsis
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent has been obtained from the patient or his/her legally acceptable representative Severe sepsis Disseminated intravascular coagulation
